title: Solar Impact Investment Platform
challenge: Optimise and develop Sun Exchange's solar peer-to-peer leasing platform and user dashboard to enhance user experience, streamline payment processes, and improve onboarding efficiency and purchases.
role: Lead UI/UX Designer and Frontend Developer
technologies: Vue.js, Vuetify, TypeScript, Strapi CMS, Git, Adobe XD, Draw.io (workflows)

bullets: Streamlined wallet-driven funding and purchase process
Significantly reduced reconciliation times and freed up core team resources
Improved onboarding process and conversions with an integrated step process and state-aware Buy buttons
Enhanced the Buy page, Dashboard, Projects, How it Works and Project cards to improve user experience and conversions

solutions.title: Streamlined Payment Flow
solutions.problem: Complex multi-payment options created a multi-team reconciliation nightmare.
solutions.solution: Redesigned wallet-only payment processes with progressive funding workflow and redesigned the Buy page.
solutionbullets: Dashboard Wallet updates to prefund before purchasing, with currency conversion
New Add funds functionality, accessible throughout the platform
Redesigned a clean and simple Buy page
impactbullets: Reduced reconciliation time from over 16hrs to under 2hrs weekly, freeing up significant team resources.
Major fullstack code update, Git noted over 10,000 lines of code changed. Single deployment, as per business request, increased the risk around a core business flow.
Users were up and running immediately. Zero issues or friction raised from both new and existing users in using, understanding and navigating the new functionality.

gallery.caption: Redesigned Buy Page with simple Wallet-only payment flow, improving user experience, streamlining purchases and significantly reducing reconcilation time. Quick access to Add Funds. Auto calculates of 'cell budget' based on wallet balances.

gallery.alt: New Add Funds accessible throughout the platform
gallery.caption: New Add Funds functionality accessible throughout the platform. Users could now prefund their Wallets via Credit Card, Bank Transfer or Crypto (BTC) before purchasing solar cells.
Updated Dashboard Wallet section with Add Funds and moved info for Cashing out to it's own tab. Also included Currency Conversion on dashboard for users to see ZAR and BTC in USD, EUR or GBP.

gallery.caption: Updated 'Coming Soon' Projects to show wallet balance with motivation and call to action (zoomed-in)

gallery.caption: Mapping new Wallet-only Add Funds flow

solutions.title: Onboarding Redesign
solutions.problem: Data analysis showed a noteworthy drop-off of users during a fragmented KYC (Know Your Customer) process.
solutions.solution: Redesigned the onboarding process, improving new-user completion rates and reducing customer support tickets. Created an integrated stepper on the user's dashboard with contextual guidance.
impactbullets: Marked improvement in the new-user to first purchase rates
Reduced customer support tickets substantially, freeing up team resources

gallery.alt: New Dashboard Onboarding Stepper with Contextual Guidance
gallery.caption: New Dashboard Onboarding Stepper with contextual guidance for users. Dashboard state showing New user with no cells. When Profile is incomplete, Dashboard auto focuses the Profile tab. Clear motivation in the Wallet section to fund wallets to buy solar cells.
Old Dashboard overview (not my work) - New user no cells. Statements of missing parts instead of motivation why they would want to with guidance on what to do next.

gallery.alt: New Dashboard overview new user no cells pre Onboarding updates
gallery.caption: New Dashboard overview - New user no cells (pre Onboarding updates). Showing improved contextual guidance and motivation to fund and buy cells.

gallery.alt: Incomplete onboarding showing updated Add Funds and Buy buttons and Dashboard Profile tab highlighted.
gallery.caption: An incomplete Onboarding state filters through to update the text and action on the Add Funds and Buy buttons. In this state, these core buttons redirect to the Dashboard Profile tab. The Dashboard Profile tab is highlighted and focused in an incomplete profile state, encouraging the user to proceed with the next steps.

gallery.alt: Journey and Workflow mapping to identify and resolve friction points during Onboarding
gallery.caption: Snapshot of part of the journey and Workflow mapping to identify and resolve friction points during Onboarding.

solutions.title: Trust & Conversion Optimisations
solutions.problem: Identified trust barriers through user journey mapping, reviewing customer support tickets, data analysis and empathy for the user.
solutions.solution: Enhanced project transparency with social proof, progress indicators and impact highlighting. Improved contextual guidance and motivation around project state, inline with preferred user behaviour and response.
solutionbullets: Boost user confidence by improving trust and conversion through project transparency
Highlight ongoing impact benefits of investments
impactbullets: Put forward ideas, proposals and high fidelity mockups for business review and approval
Updates were intended to improve the users trust and conversion, and make their journey as simple and easy as possible, and strengthen user confidence in 20-year investment decision
Intended to boost sign up conversions, solar cell purchases and long-term impact awareness.

gallery.caption: Project page Key Facts (left, not my work) converted to a functional Earnings Estimator (right) allowing users to calculate their spend, impact and income earnings in their currency: USD, EUR, GBP and ZAR (showing ZAR)
